channel.title: Siteupdate on Radio4000 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Siteupdate on Radio4000 Blog

item.title: Site Update, May 2nd 2015
item.description: What is new? support heavier images and .gif mobile design of the playback performances no more new radio prompt when you already had one If you have a question or feedback you can send it to us via the comment of this post or on the Radio4000 Google group
